name: Dealgado
overview:
The Dealgado.com system originated as a reaction to the time consuming and costly process of matching businesses with discount sites. Dealgado.com makes the entire process more simple for both parties due to its unique accelerated structure. As such, it acts as a catalyst to get the job done effortlessly.

Dealgado.com is a modern and innovative way of connecting businesses and discount sites.

The Dealgado.com system helps companies which have decided to offer a conditional discount on their products or services and the ability to post their offer just once. Dealgado.com then offers the companies deal to multiple discount sites all at once. The company entering the discount into Dealgado.com will then have a wealth of information available to them to help with making the decision of which company to offer their deal to, including:

  1. The commission percentage they would earn with each company which is shared only with the business user.
  2. The number of Facebook fans the discount company making the offer has – a great way to gauge popularity.
  3. The volume of discount site visits.
  4. Number of coupons sold previously by the discount company.
